amendatorysection.catchline: Election; adoption of plan; when effective; rejection; resubmission.
amendatorysection.para: If the plan of government provided in sections 19-601 to 19-648 is approved by a majority of the electors voting thereon, it shall go into effect immediately, insofar as it applies to the nomination and election of officers provided for herein, and in all other respects it shall go into effect on the first Monday following the next regular municipal election. If the proposition to adopt the provisions of sections 19-601 to 19-648 is rejected by the electors, it shall not again be submitted in that city within two years thereafter.
